snippet: Once Facebook increases its advertising, its shares are expected to climb, but for now they are down.
abstract: Facebook shares fall nearly 4 percent to $20.88, nearly half of what they were worth when the company went public on May 17; its shares are expected to climb once it increases its advertising.
lead_paragraph: Once Facebook increases its advertising, its shares are expected to climb, but for now they are down.

headline.seo: Facebook’s Slide Continues Despite the Market’s Hopes
headline.main: Facebook’s Slide Continues Despite the Company’s Reach and the Market’s Hopes
headline.print_headline: Facebook’s Slide Continues Despite the Company’s Reach and the Market’s Hopes
